title: 85/352/EEC: Commission Decision of 19 June 1985 authorizing the French Republic to apply intra-Community surveillance to imports of apricots originating in Spain which have been put into free circulation in the other Member States (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 19 June 1985
authorizing the French Republic to apply intra-Community surveillance to imports of apricots originating in Spain which have been put into free circulation in the other Member States
(Only the French text is authentic)
(85/352/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The French Republic is authorized to apply intra-Community surveillance to apricots falling within subheading 08.07 A of the Common Customs Tariff, originating in Spain and put into free circulation in another Member State, in accordance with Article 2 of Decision 80/47/EEC, until 31 July 1985.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 June 1985.
For the Commission
Willy DE CLERCQ
Member of the Commission
